title: Biggest Dreamer

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Select a target and up to two words. Tonight, their actions will be processed as if any instance of those words in their abilities/attributes was removed
- Dream big, doing the same thing as your first ability but instead allowing you to select up to one hundred million words. (1 use)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Your abilities can’t be Rule 17’d, prevented, or interfered with under any circumstance.
- You may self-target.

desc:
Post 3311
*Even if a hundred million stars fall from heaven, I'll keep fighting!*
